name: Activation Validator
description: Service for validation of Dandelion Channel publication payloads. Provides rules-based validation at product batch, product, and attribute levels. Features an admin UI for managing validation rules and domains, plus an API for triggering validation runs. Supports AI-powered validations including style guide checks and nutrient label extraction.

name: Dandelion Channel
description: Salsify's channel publication system that generates payloads for syndication to retail endpoints. The activation-validator service validates these Dandelion Channel publication payloads before they are sent to retailers.

name: Content Quality Workflow
description: A validation workflow in Salsify that uses AI models to check product content against style guides and extract data from nutrient labels. Powered by Azure AI (for style guide checks) and Google Cloud Document AI (for nutrient/ingredient label extraction).

name: Kroger Direct Connection
description: A direct integration channel for syndicating product content to Kroger. One of the initial focus areas for the activation-validator service development.
